scripts.push:mmo: screeps-api download -d tmp && yarn build && cp dist/main.js tmp/zeswarm.js && screeps-api upload tmp/*.js
scripts.push:botarena: yarn build && yarn run push --server botarena
scripts.push:local: yarn build && yarn run push --server local
scripts.push:test: yarn build && yarn run push --server test
scripts.push:splus1: yarn build && yarn run push --server splus
scripts.push:splus2: yarn build && yarn run push --server splus2
scripts.push:fordo: yarn build && yarn run push --server fordo
scripts.push:prtest: yarn build && yarn run push --server prtest
scripts.push:all: yarn build && yarn run push --server test && yarn run push --server splus && yarn run push --server splus2 && yarn run push --server fordo
